title: Studio Rentals
text:
The Heritage Foundation’s Freedom Center studios features state-of-the-art full HD TV and radio studio spaces, located just steps away from the Supreme Court and the Senate side of Capitol Hill.

The George T. Elmore Family TV Studio

The Elmore TV Studio, renovated in 2016, is a full HD TV studio with IP and Vivex connection capabilities. The studio also features brand-neutral and/or customizable static and motion backdrops.

Robert H. Bruce Radio Studio Capabilities

The Bruce Radio studio is under renovation to update its connections and capabilities to facilitate live radio, podcasting and Facebook Live transmissions. The Bruce Radio studio has Internet and cable TV access to stay abreast of breaking news while on the air.

Studio Booking Rates

TV - Rates per hour

Corporate and 501(c)(4) Organizations - $350

501(c)(3)Organizations - $100

Radio - Rates per hour

Corporate and 501(c)(4) Organizations - $200

501(c)(3) Organizations - $100

For more information about rates and space availability, please complete this request form. Contact us at 202-675-1761 or HeritagePress@heritage.org with questions.
